title: Utility Work Planned on Entrada Drive May 27-May 30
content: City contractors will be constructing new utility connections for the New Police Headquarters project during the period of Tuesday, May 27th through Friday, May 30th. During construction there will be intermittent lane closures on Entrada Drive; however access to all residences and the Orangebrook Golf & Country Club will be maintained at all times.
